flawed_nl_solution:
If the solver got a head in 65 of the 211 flips, he got 211-65 =<<211-65=146>>146 tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is 146-65=<<146-65=84>>84
#### 84

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 81, not 84. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
